alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:23AM EDT until July 26 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAMOILLE AND SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1223 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fletcher, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Johnson Village, Waterville, Johnson, Jeffersonville Village, Bakersfield, Cambridge Village, Belvidere Center, Fletcher, Fairfield, Belvidere, Cambridge, Montgomery, Fairfax, Enosburg, Eden, Jeffersonville, East Fletcher, East Fairfield, Binghamville, and Belvidere Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
